alert.note: Alert for Orange; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 3:43PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Lake and western Orange Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 342 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Mascotte to near Clermont to Oakland. Movement was north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Apopka, Ocoee, Winter Garden, Tavares and Groveland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!
